name: Swift Sketches Bookmark
description:
You can now buy the sketches you see on swiftsketches.tumblr.com in bookmark form!
(The bookmarks are made to order-the picture here is just an example of possible sketches you can order on a bookmark, you don't have to order the these exact outfits)

The bookmarks are made using black and white card stock (black for the bookmark itself; the sketches are drawn on white card stock). Each sketch is signed by me. The sketches are made using markers, felt tip pens, gel pens and glitter (loose and glue).

On the back of each bookmark is information about when/where Taylor wore the outfit sketched, the url for the Swift Sketches Tumblr, my logo and the Swift Sketches seal.

BOOKMARK 1: Measures 2 by 6 inches. It features a textured thread tassel. You can choose one of six thread colours (orange, red, green, blue, purple, yellow). 

BOOKMARK 2: Measures 1 7/8 by 4.5 inches (full length: 1 7/8 by 9 inches). It features magnets that hold the bookmark to your page. Simply open the bookmark, slide it onto the top of you page, and then close it; the magnets will allow the bookmark to stay in place.

These bookmarks are made to order. Once you order a bookmark(s), please notify me with which outfit(s) you would like me to sketch for you. I will then sketch it personally for you. Due to the handmade/drawn nature of these sketches, therefore, the sketch may not look exactly like it does on the Swift Sketches tumblr.

To see the sketches I have drawn already, visit swiftsketches.tumblr.com/archive to view them visually, and swiftsketches.tumblr.com/outfits to view a clickable list. Note - you are not limited to request one of these outfits. If there is an outfit you would like that I haven't already drawn, I would still be happy to sketch it for you.

If you have any questions feel free to contact me through BigCartel or Tumblr.
